DOC.brief_summary: A study to test the effects of study drug (MK 0633) on patients with Atherosclerotic disease
DOC.brief_title: The Effect of MK 0633 in Patients With Atherosclerosis (0633-008)(COMPLETED)
DOC.criteria: Patients with plaque in coronary or leg arteries, known as atherosclerosis or peripheral vascular disease Inflammatory marker found in your blood, known as hsCRP > 0.5 mg/L Age < 40 or > 85 Female Heart attack, coronary artery bypass, stroke or unstable angina in last 3 months Liver diseased or abnormalities HIV infection Lupus, rheumatoid arthritis, cancer <5 years
